QuestData.Title: One Bitter Wish
QuestData.Description: Morra sent you? I should have listened to her - it's just hard to take trolls seriously I guess.$B$B<Alanndarian lets out a weak chuckle.>$B$BIt's way too late for that anyway. We're mortal now... this is the fate we have to face, one way or another. I've had time to accept that.$B$BI have one request though... kill the torturer that did this to me. They call him Rit'ko... you can find him just ahead with the other prisoner.$B$B<Alanndarian offers a small smile, then winces and slumps back over in pain.>
QuestData.RewardText: Alanndarian is dead then. That saddens me greatly, but it is not entirely unexpected. I expect no mercy from these savages, and will show them none.
